about_the_game:
Solace: Playable Teaser

Step into the haunting world of Solace: Playable Teaser, an immersive psychological thriller that plunges you into Joel's fragmented reality. Play as Joel, a discharged police officer tormented by the disappearance of his daughter. Haunted by insomnia and driven by an obsessive need to find her, Joel's investigation takes you deep into a chilling nightmare where the line between reality and delusion is blurred.

Key Features:

  • Psychological Thriller: Immerse yourself in a dark narrative as Joel, an ex-detective whose life is in turmoil. His quest to find his daughter leads him into a psychological maze where every clue challenges his grasp on reality.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Explore Joel's home, a place filled with haunting memories and cryptic clues. Every room, every corner holds a piece of the story, beckoning you to uncover its secrets.

  • Intricate Puzzles: Solve complex puzzles that reveal fragmented memories and hidden messages. Each puzzle you solve brings you closer to the unsettling truth.

  • Immersive Storytelling: Engage with the story through interactive elements. Discover old letters, prescription papers, and VHS tapes that unveil poignant moments of Joel's past.

  • Realistic Audio and Visuals: High-resolution graphics and immersive audio design bring the haunting atmosphere to life. The ominous background music, eerie whispers, and fragmented voices guide you through Joel's fractured reality.

  • Psychological Depth: Experience the themes of loss, guilt, and obsession as Joel's insomnia skews his perception of reality. Navigate his deteriorating psyche to uncover the elusive truth.

Goal of the Game:

Navigate through Joel's house, solving cryptic puzzles and uncovering the unsettling mysteries hidden within. The eerie atmosphere and the terror of Joel's guilt will keep you on edge as you explore. As you delve deeper, you will sense an unsettling presence, guiding and influencing Joel's journey through his darkest moments.

Explore the Mysteries:

Joel's house is filled with cryptic clues and haunting artifacts. Discover VHS tapes, photos, drawings, sticky notes, and radio broadcasts that piece together the story in unsettling ways:

  • VHS Tapes: Unearth tapes that provide fragmented glimpses into the past and Joel's troubled mind.

  • Photos and Drawings: Visual clues evoke emotional responses, drawing you deeper into Joel's disturbed psyche.

  • Decorations and Sticky Notes: Contain fragmented messages and subtle hints, challenging you to piece together the truth.

  • Radio Broadcasts: Eerie background information that adds layers to the narrative.

Prepare to question your reality and confront your fears in Solace, where every shadow hides a story and every clue unravels the chilling truth. Step into Joel's mind and influence his journey through his darkest hours.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated GPU or Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements should allow for Low/Medium quality settings in 1080p with stable 30-60 FPS. An SSD is recommended.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M2 Pro or Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M2 Pro GPU or Intel UHD Graphics 630 or higher
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements should allow for High/Ultra quality settings in 1080p or higher with stable 60 FPS. Optimized for Apple Silicon devices, particularly those with ProMotion displays (supports up to 120Hz adaptive refresh rate). An SSD is highly recommended for faster loading times.
